verses.verse: {Praising God for His Graciousness} d Hallelujah! Praise the name of the Lord ! Give praise, you servants of the Lord ,
you who are standing in the Lord's Temple, in the courtyards of the house of our God.
Praise the Lord , because the Lord is good; Sing to his name, for he is gracious.
It is Jacob whom the Lord chose for himself Israel as his personal possession
Indeed, I know that the Lord is great, and that our Lord {So MT LXX; DSS 11QPs a reads God} surpasses all gods.
The Lord does whatever pleases him in heaven and on earth, in the seas and all its {So DSS 11QPs a ; MT LXX lack its} deep regions.
He makes the clouds rise from the ends of the earth; fashioning lightning for the rain, bringing the wind from his storehouses.
It was the Lord {Lit. was he} who struck down the firstborn of Egypt, including both men and animals.
He sent signs and wonders among you, Egypt, before {Or among} Pharaoh and all his servants.
He struck down many nations, killing many kings
Sihon, king of the Amorites, Og, king of Bashan, and every kingdom of Canaan
and he gave their land as an inheritance, an inheritance to his people Israel.
Your name, Lord , exists forever, and your reputation, Lord , throughout the ages.
For the Lord will vindicate his people, and he will show compassion on his servants.
The idols of the nations are silver and gold, worked by {So MT LXX; DSS 4QPs k reads gold, products of} the hands of human beings.
Mouths are attributed to them, but they cannot speak; sight is attributed to them, but they cannot see;
ears are attributed to them, but they do not hear, and there is no breath in their mouths.
Those who craft them and all {So LXX DSS 11QPs a ; the lacks and} who trust in them will become like them.
House of Israel, bless the Lord ! House of Aaron, bless the Lord !
House of Levi, bless the Lord ! You who fear the Lord , bless the Lord !
Blessed be the Lord from Zion, he who lives in Jerusalem. Hallelujah!
